title: feat: make 5 models paid-only and migrate Mistral to OVHcloud
author: ElliotEtag

gist.summary: Transitioning select premium models to supporter tiers and migrating Mistral to improved infrastructure.
gist.impact: Ensures sustainable access to high-cost models like Claude and Grok while optimizing backend performance.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations bee is tending to a special 'Rare Plants' section of the garden (representing the premium models) and moving a cloud sprite (Mistral) to a new, sturdier pot. The vibe is about care, cultivation, and upgrading the home for these valuable assets.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the Pollinations bee carefully tending to a special garden section with glowing rare crystal flowers. Cozy 8-bit pixel art aesthetic. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Bee character with chunky retro sprites moving a cloud-shaped plant to a new pot. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley or A Short Hike. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.

image.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the Pollinations bee carefully tending to a special garden section with glowing rare crystal flowers. Cozy 8-bit pixel art aesthetic. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Bee character with chunky retro sprites moving a cloud-shaped plant to a new pot.
